message.body: thanks for renewing! I don't understand the domain vs hosting thing. have a great time in FL! if you have a break tmrw I could talk and if not when you get back!
How was the wedding!? Frankie got her anal glands expressed today we are both traumatized. I will try to call tmw during a break if I get one.
hahaha I know how that is, very traumatizing. wedding was fun!
do you care if yr credited as AC or gaffer for ADAM? they have you as AC, I know you and Craig did both but that wouldn't look as professional
I don't mind if I'm gaffer
well you're AC now, would you rather be gaffer?
Oh that's fine!
I'm not that picky
k well if you have a preference I'm doing the credits and can't really remember who did more of what
I definitely gaffed more. Craig was def AC. He knew way more
I think that's a more accurate credit line up but if it's too hard to change I'm okay with being gaffer!
I mean AC
OMG I'm making this confusing
no I can switch them, making credits page now
Kewl! My fist gaffer credit! I can't wait to see the cut!!!
oh man the sound mix has been a disaster, Sasha did it. we could have been done so long ago
Whys it so crazy!?
he's terrible at taking direction
Really?!?
I know, it's been so frustrating
That's so surprising!
